summary: Internal FBI email chain discussing planning for victim briefings related to the Epstein case, including logistics, dates, and coordination between FBI Victim Services Division and SDNY (Southern District of New York). The document highlights FBI efforts to organize briefings for victims and their support persons.

events.title: Planned Miami Victim Briefing
events.description: Briefing for Epstein victims scheduled in Miami, with availability for large room on October 7, 8, 11, and 15.

events.title: Travel to FBI HQ
events.description: An individual plans to drive to FBI Headquarters and be on the 3rd floor in the afternoon, assuming traffic is not bad.

events.title: Office Visit at FBI HQ
events.description: An individual plans to stop by an office at FBI Headquarters on Thursday morning.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division (VSD) is organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein, with dates switched due to room availability in Miami.
VSD will pay for travel and lodging for each victim and one support person to attend the briefing at their chosen location.
Coordination with SDNY is required before finalizing briefing dates, indicating inter-agency collaboration.
A draft invitation letter and agenda for the victim briefings were attached to the email, subject to approval.
The document emphasizes confidentiality and protection of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) under the Electronic Communication Privacy Act.
